items.sentence: This history book is written for high school students.
Tom can do whatever he wants as far as I\'m concerned.
Tom couldn\'t help overhearing what Mary said to John.
I heard that Tom and Mary are planning to get married.
I heard that Tom and Mary have both been hospitalized.
I heard that both Tom and Mary have been hospitalized.
I imagine that you went through a lot of difficulties.
Are you planning on staying in Boston for a long time?
Are you sure one bottle of wine is going to be enough?
Are you sure you want to leave without saying goodbye?
